properties.description: Page title. Appears at the top of the page and can be found via Quick Find.

properties.name: propertiesUi
properties.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

values.name: key
values.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

values.name: phoneValue
values.description: Phone number. No structure is enforced.

values.name: multiSelectValue
values.description: Name of the options you want to set. Multiples can be defined separated by comma. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.

values.name: selectValue
values.description: Name of the option you want to set. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

values.name: statusValue
values.description: Name of the option you want to set. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

values.name: emailValue
values.description: Email address

values.name: urlValue
values.description: Web address

values.name: peopleValue
values.description: List of users. Multiples can be defined separated by comma. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.

values.name: relationValue
values.description: List of databases that belong to another database. Multiples can be defined separated by comma.

values.name: checkboxValue
values.description: Whether or not the checkbox is checked. true represents checked. false represents unchecked.

values.name: numberValue
values.description: Number value

values.name: range
values.description: Whether or not you want to define a date range

values.name: includeTime
values.description: Whether or not to include the time in the date

values.name: date
values.description: An ISO 8601 format date, with optional time

values.name: dateStart
values.description: An ISO 8601 format date, with optional time

values.name: dateEnd
values.description: An ISO 8601 formatted date, with optional time. Represents the end of a date range.

values.name: timezone
values.description: Time zone to use. By default n8n timezone is used. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

values.name: fileUrls
values.description: Link to externally hosted file

values.name: url
values.description: Link to externally hosted file

notices.name: notionNotice
notices.text: In Notion, make sure to add your connection to the pages you want to access.

notes.name: Notes
notes.description: Optional note to save with the node

notesInFlow.name: Display Note in Flow?
notesInFlow.description: If active, the note above will display in the flow as a subtitle

alwaysOutputData.name: Always Output Data
alwaysOutputData.description: If active, will output a single, empty item when the output would have been empty. Use to prevent the workflow finishing on this node

executeOnce.name: Execute Once
executeOnce.description: If active, the node executes only once, with data from the first item it receives

retryOnFail.name: Retry On Fail
retryOnFail.description: If active, the node tries to execute again when it fails

maxTries.name: Max. Tries
maxTries.description: Number of times to attempt to execute the node before failing the execution

waitBetweenTries.name: Wait Between Tries (ms)
waitBetweenTries.description: How long to wait between each attempt (in milliseconds)

onError.name: On Error
onError.description: Action to take when the node execution fails

options.name: Stop Workflow
options.description: Halt execution and fail workflow

options.name: Continue
options.description: Pass error message as item in regular output

options.name: Continue (using error output)
options.description: Pass item to an extra `error` output

settings.note: Executable nodes have both common and executable settings
